name: Visual Studio Project Files Converter
short_description:
Now you dont have to worry about how to upgrade your projects from higher version to lower versions and from lower version to higher version.

This tool will convert:
- Visual Studio 2005 project files to Visual Studio 2008 and Visual Studio 2010

- Visual Studio 2008 project files to Visual Studio 2005 and Visual Studio 2010

- Visual Studio 2010 project files to Visual Studio 2005 and Visual Studio 2008

This tool can work on multi projects conversion at the same time.
summary: Convert Visual Studio Projects in all versions
